PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 1998-01991998-02-170,  FIN,  ,  , 
PrecisAppointment of the HONOURABLE ROBERT CARMAN COATES, P.C., Q.C., of Amherst, Nova Scotia, as a temporary member of the Canadian International Trade Tribunal to hold office during good behaviour for a term ending May 30, 1998; and order that he shall be deemed to be employed in the Public Service for the purposes of the Public Service Superannuation Act, effective February 1, 1998.
Attachments
